name: DailySignal
text:
Read the history of the poem “Lift Every Voice and Sing”—first performed by schoolchildren in celebration of President Lincoln’s birthday in 1900. 

Read the words that became the song. 

It’s about every voice and the harmony of liberty.

@kenblackwell https://t.co/KS3Mkv882H

name: DailySignal
text:
In a country as politically diverse and charged as the United States, we must preserve the integrity of our institutions and the crucial role they play in working on behalf of all Americans, regardless of their political affiliation.

Read @arightside: https://t.co/eQWoqVLrfK
